API_KEY.description: A Google API key. You can generate one at https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials. The key needs a minimun of access to the Drive and Sheets APIs.

SHEET_ID.description: The ID of the Google sheet you'd like to serve the API from. The sheet needs to have public read access.

CELL_RANGE.description: The cell range you'd like to use for API data. This can be the worksheet name, e.g. Sheet1, or a range like Sheet1!a1:c5. (NB: if you use a whole worksheet, your data table must start at cell a1)
